editorialSummary.text: Long-standing chain selling the brand's contemporary Swiss-made watches in a variety of styles.

So, me and my family with my 2kids we were excited to purchase the watch . We bought 2 Swatch/omega today and I am not satisfied with the sales assistant her name is Crystl, demi was there assisting us also  But this crystal girl and the small white guy was mean i donâ€™t feel thr vibe ,  I was planning to use my After pay or Klarna but they were like telling us Swatch is not accepting any installment app what the heck all establisments do accept now a days, and I know that even if the store is not affiliated with klarna, afterpay etc you can pay In-store. originalText.text: I paid this store a visit this morning in order to purchase a mission to Saturn watch. While reading the reviews I was a little skeptical in wasting my time on this location. But thanks to associates Julianna and Demi, all my doubts went straight out the window. I was formally greeted by Julianna who made me feel very warm and answered all of my exasperating questions. Have to say I had an amazing experience. 5 stars

originalText.text: Awful awful staff in a nice store. We were the only customers in the store and I asked one of the two staff to try on a watch. They were busy chatting to eachother and ignored me even though I was standing two feet away. Eventually Mark reluctantly and without any words handed me the watch I had asked for, it wasnâ€™t for me so I asked to try on a different version of the same one. He told me I was only allowed to try on one watch, then went back to chatting to his equally rude colleague. We left immediately, Mark is terrible for the Swatch brand, Iâ€™ve been buying  Swatch watches for 30 years and was really sad to have such a bad experience with a brand I was fond of.

originalText.text: Five star because they turned a negative experience into a positive. I visited the time square location first looking for Blancpain collaboration. At time square they were very unfriendly and basically told me that if I want one to show up like everybody else before regular store hours and make line. I decided to walk to 5th Avenue and give it a chance. The representative that assisted me by name of Ariel was very friendly and welcoming. When I mentioned my situation he brightened my day by telling me how in luck I was because he had three watches left and to my surprise the one I was looking for. Thank you, Ariel. His colleague was very nice as well and the security guard. Thank you Swatch of 5th Avenue.

originalText.text:
Excellent Honest Customer-oriented  Service provided by Female SWATCH KEY Manager Ms Julianna
Thank you & I WILL be back & will recommend your store!

Prices are reasonable for me, Myriad designs to choose from including watch strap materials &

I love the fact that the battery etc lifetime warranty at any SWATCH store!

Grateful to SWATCH
